original_text: Whenever David's men attacked them, they killed all the men and women. But they took all their sheep, cows, donkeys and camels, as well as their clothes. Then they would return to see King Achish.
korean_text: 다윗이 그 땅을 쳐서 남녀를 살려두지 아니하고 양과 소와 나귀와 낙타와 의복을 빼앗아 가지고 돌아와 아기스에게 이르매

sentences.original_text: they killed all the men and women
But they took all their sheep
Then they would return to see King Achish
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 아기스 왕을 만나러 돌아갔다
